physical_appearance:\This is a dark green cheongsam that is paired with a long-sleeved matching jacket
 also dark green in colour. The cheongsam is sleeveless. There are floral patterns only on the collar and sleeves of the jacket
 but not on the cheongsam. A collar is present on the cheongsam but not on the jacket. There are two buttons located on the right front of the jacket
 with one being above the other. They are circular in shape. There are no visible tears on the cheongsam and the jacket. There is a label tag that is titled \\Johnson\\ located at the collar of the jacket.\

sgcool_label_text:This is a sleeveless dark green cheongsam with a matching jacket. The jacket is decorated with purple
 pink and green floral lace at the collar and sleeves. The cheongsam is made in Hong Kong and has a tailor’s label
 “Johnson”.

metadata.title_text: Dark green cheongsam with matching jacket
metadata.physical_appearance: "This is a dark green cheongsam that is paired with a long-sleeved matching jacket, also dark green in colour. The cheongsam is sleeveless. There are floral patterns only on the collar and sleeves of the jacket, but not on the cheongsam. A collar is present on the cheongsam but not on the jacket. There are two buttons located on the right front of the jacket, with one being above the other. They are circular in shape. There are no visible tears on the cheongsam and the jacket. There is a label tag that is titled ""Johnson"" located at the collar of the jacket."

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This is a sleeveless dark green cheongsam with a matching jacket. The jacket is decorated with purple, pink and green floral lace at the collar and sleeves. The cheongsam is made in Hong Kong and has a tailor’s label, “Johnson”.
